name: Pumpig in The Monster Apocalypse
description:
The Zombie apocalypse is here and you are…. A Pig?

You play as Pumpig as you journey to get to your friend: The Headless HORSEman (who is a horse) in the zombie apocalypse!!!! 

Zombie:Moaning and slow. Can One hit K.O you!

Skeleton: Just Rams into you but try to shake it off your tail.

Made for Mini jam!

(Note I made an update but only because it would not load)
